scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:acesso" "npm run start:criarusuario" "npm run start:manipulararquivos" "npm run start:manipularpost"
scripts.start:acesso: cd Acesso && npm i && node index.js
scripts.start:manipulararquivos: cd ManipularArquivos && npm i && node index.js
scripts.start:manipularpost: cd ManipularPost && npm i && node index.js
